attributes.action: Make schools have 18 hours off education a week
attributes.additional_details: Because students can have more of social time getting exercise and other stuff out side of learning
attributes.background: Basically people want school days to be shortened and if people want other stuff like more of a opportunity to learn they can sign up to some  clubs or after school stuff

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the length of the school week, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Your petition says "Make schools have 18 hours off education a week", and we're not sure if you want the Government to limit school to 18 hours a week or do something different.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
